sentences.english: Water splashed near his shoe-tops as he moved forward.
sentences.chinese: 他向前走的时候，水花在他的鞋尖附近飞溅着。

sentences.english: To add depth to the splatter, first place one normal splatter on one layer.
sentences.chinese: 要添加深入到飞溅，首先是一个正常的飞溅的一层。

sentences.english: Was subsequently greeted with at least a car accident died, should be a "red blood splash, " was intended.
sentences.chinese: 后来终遭致车祸而死，应了“红血飞溅”之意。

sentences.english: It may seize up and spatter and generally be disagreeable.
sentences.chinese: 糖浆会结块并且飞溅起来，这通常让人恼火。

sentences.english: Learn how to watercolor splatter paint in this free art lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何水彩颜料飞溅在这个自由的艺术课视频。

sentences.english: The sea spry stings all their cuts and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 飞溅的浪花灼痛了他们的伤口和肿处。

sentences.english: The spurting blood turned the white mulberry tree into a dark purple.
sentences.chinese: 那飞溅的鲜血把那棵白桑树也染成了深紫色。

sentences.english: Air-cooled, shifting belt drive, splash lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 风冷，移动式，皮带传动，飞溅润滑。

sentences.english: The hot oil in the pot spluttered out onto my hand.
sentences.chinese: 锅里的热油飞溅出来落在了我的手上。

sentences.english: The " Deep Impact" made the powdery fragments on the surface of the comet nucleus splash in all directions.
sentences.chinese: “深度撞击”使彗核表面的细粉状碎屑四处飞溅。

sentences.english: Put on your boots. Splash ih the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 穿上你的靴子，飞溅在水坑里。

sentences.english: Learn about splatter painting from a professional artist in this free watercolor painting video.
sentences.chinese: 了解有关飞溅从专业画家画水彩画在此免费视频。
戴好防护镜，防止物料飞溅。

definition: (of droplets, sparks etc) to fly about in all directions/to splatter everywhere
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
to disperse/to scatter in all directions
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
